ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] I'm Excited
ygData.msgSnippet: My son was 9lbs 9oz... my niece is the first girl out of us siblings that have had munchkins. I really really really hope I am blessed in the future with a
ygData.messageBody:
"My son" was 9lbs 9oz... my niece is the first girl out of us siblings that have had munchkins. I really really really hope I am blessed in the future with a little girl to have hold and love. I am happy for my sister but jealous at the same time!!! Thankfully she said I could "kidnap" her little one but I'm waiting until she's bigger since 3lbs is too small for me and I'd be afraid of hurting her... my son was huge so he was easy to me.
 
Beverly---


"Dr. Mom" <drmom5@...> wrote:
OMG!  Less than 4 lbs.  I can't imagine that!  I saw one at
Challenger Little League who was "up to 6lbs" now.  My smallest one
was 7 11 (and I don't have diabetes.)


._.~*~._.~*~.Beverly R._.~*~._.~*~.
